existing_features.title: Revert the visual theme to the previous version: restore the original color palette, typography, and styling that existed before version 44. Undo any theme changes introduced in version 44.
Restore all original images that were replaced or removed in version 44. Revert any CSS-based visuals back to the original image assets.

Remove the mobile/phone number from every location it appears across the entire site, including the Header, Footer, Contact page (contact info cards), and any other components or pages that display it.
Remove the login button from the Header navigation. The login/authentication UI element (Internet Identity login button) must not be visible to any site visitor.

new_feature_requests.summary: Revert to old theme and images
Remove mobile number from everywhere on the site
